org.gbif.api.service.collections

Interface PersonService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommentService, CrudService<Person>, IdentifierService, MachineTagService, TagService

    public interface PersonService
extends CrudService<Person>, IdentifierService, TagService, MachineTagService, CommentService
    API Service for the collections-related staff.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • list

        PagingResponse<Person> list(@Nullable
                            String query,
                            @Nullable
                            UUID institutionKey,
                            @Nullable
                            UUID collectionKey,
                            @Nullable
                            Pageable page)
        Pages Person entities based on the parameters received. To iterate over all entities you can use code like this: PagingRequest req = new PagingRequest(); PagingResponse<T> response; do { response = service.list(req); for (T obj : response.getResults()) { doStuff(); } req.nextPage(); } while (!response.isEndOfRecords());
        Parameters:
        query - to make a full text search
        institutionKey - key of an institution to filter by
        collectionKey - key of a collection to filter by
        page - paging parameters
        Returns:
        a list of entities ordered by their creation date, newest coming first

      • listDeleted

        PagingResponse<Person> listDeleted(@Nullable
                                   Pageable page)
        Provides access to deleted persons.

      • suggest

        List<PersonSuggestResult> suggest(@Nullable
                                  String q)
        Provides a simple suggest service.
